summary: A family's life is thrown into comical chaos after mom accidentally drinks her inventor husband's latest concoction, an invisibility potion.
cast: Dee Wallace|Barry Livingston|Trenton Knight|Giuseppe Andrews|Steve Barkett|Gary Graver|Vanessa Greyshock|William C. Martell|Pam Phillips|Fred Olen Ray|Tripp Reed|Beth Ulrich|Kathy Garver
keywords: husband wife relationship|father son relationship|mother son relationship|family relationships|scientist
title: Mama es invisible
